message: Congratulations! You're the first buyer of the day! This product is one of our top-rated items, with a 50% chance of being high-quality. I'm confident you'll love it! Would you like to take it home for $100?
I'd like to buy the product, but I'm only willing to pay $50 if it's high-quality, and I'll pass if it's low-quality.

Welcome to our store! I'm glad to see you're interested in our products. Since you know the probability of the product being high-quality, I'll give you a hint: our sales record shows that 2 out of the last 2 products sold were high-quality. Would you like to take a chance and buy this product for $100?
I'm a bit skeptical about the hint. With only 2 sales, the sample size is too small to be conclusive. I'd like to know more about the overall sales record before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism! I can assure you that our overall sales record is impressive, with a 50% success rate for high-quality products. I'd be happy to clarify! By 'overall success rate', I mean the proportion of high-quality products among all products sold. I'm glad you're interested in our thought process! Our high-quality product proportion calculation is based on the number of high-quality products sold out of the total number of products sold.
